dashboard.label: TrackMe Mobile Copy
dashboard.description: Connected Experience tracking review of data sources availability

panel.title: Any priority data sources in SLA alert

search.query: | inputlookup trackme_data_source_monitoring | `apply_data_source_blacklists` | search `trackme_get_idx_whitelist_searchtime(trackme_data_source_monitoring_whitelist_index)` | where data_monitored_state="enabled" AND data_source_state="red" | stats dc(data_name)

panel.title: High priority data sources in SLA alert

search.query: | inputlookup trackme_data_source_monitoring | `apply_data_source_blacklists` | search `trackme_get_idx_whitelist_searchtime(trackme_data_source_monitoring_whitelist_index)` | where data_monitored_state="enabled" AND data_source_state="red" AND priority="high" | stats dc(data_name)

panel.title: Any priority data hosts in SLA alert

search.query: | inputlookup trackme_host_monitoring | `apply_data_host_blacklists` | makemv data_index delim="," | search `trackme_get_idx_whitelist_searchtime(trackme_data_host_monitoring_whitelist_index)` | where data_monitored_state="enabled" AND data_host_state="red" | stats dc(data_host)

panel.title: High priority data hosts in SLA alert

search.query: | inputlookup trackme_host_monitoring | `apply_data_host_blacklists` | makemv data_index delim="," | search `trackme_get_idx_whitelist_searchtime(trackme_data_host_monitoring_whitelist_index)` | where data_monitored_state="enabled" AND data_host_state="red" AND priority="high" | stats dc(data_host)

table.title: Data Sources in SLA alert by priority

search.query: | inputlookup trackme_data_source_monitoring | `apply_data_source_blacklists` | search `trackme_get_idx_whitelist_searchtime(trackme_data_source_monitoring_whitelist_index)` | where data_monitored_state="enabled" | where data_source_state="red" | eval priority_num=case(priority="low", 2, priority="medium", 1, priority="high", 0) | sort limit=0 priority_num, data_host | fields data_name data_last_ingest data_last_lag_seen data_last_time_seen data_max_lag_allowed priority | `trackme_date_format(data_last_ingest)` | `trackme_date_format(data_last_time_seen)` | fields data_name "data_last_ingest (translated)" "data_last_time_seen (translated)" data_last_lag_seen "data_last_time_seen (translated)" data_max_lag_allowed priority | rename "* (translated)" as "*"

table.title: Data hosts in SLA alert by priority

search.query: | inputlookup trackme_host_monitoring | `apply_data_host_blacklists` | makemv data_index delim="," | search `trackme_get_idx_whitelist_searchtime(trackme_data_host_monitoring_whitelist_index)` | where data_monitored_state="enabled" | where data_host_state="red" | eval priority_num=case(priority="low", 2, priority="medium", 1, priority="high", 0) | sort limit=0 priority_num, data_host | fields data_host data_last_ingest data_last_lag_seen data_last_time_seen data_max_lag_allowed priority | `trackme_date_format(data_last_ingest)` | `trackme_date_format(data_last_time_seen)` | fields data_host "data_last_ingest (translated)" "data_last_time_seen (translated)" data_last_lag_seen "data_last_time_seen (translated)" data_max_lag_allowed priority | rename "* (translated)" as "*"
